name: Honchkrow

passive.name: Tool Hunter
passive.effect: Once per turn, you may search your deck or discard for a Tool, show it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

attacks.name: Thief
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokemon has a Tool attached, you may discard it and attach a copy to Honchkrow.

attacks.name: Harass
attacks.effect: Pick 3 cards at random from your opponents hand. They may discard each of them. For each one that they do, this attack does 10 less damage.

flavor: These crows run the show. They've been seen bribing other Pokemon with food to betray their trainers.
